attributes.action: Remove value added tax from household domestic energy bills as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details: Millions are heading into fuel poverty this can't be ignored, action is needed immediately
attributes.background: The cost of living is soaring families are having to choose whether to eat or heat their homes. During the Brexit campaign the public were lead to believe VAT could be cut or removed from domestic energy bills. Now is the time for this to be done.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove VAT from all domestic fuel, and provide price capping on heating oil: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598647

Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609
